title: Inversion.MULTi5-PROPHET
description:
Inversion  (c) Namco Bandai Games                       
                                                                  
         release date ...: January 2767                           
         protection .....: Steam                                  
         # of discs .....: 1                                      
         languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES                         
         ---------------------------------------------------      
                                                                  
         Don't just defy gravity. Command it.  Take  on  the      
         role of a young father and husband, Davis  Russell,      
         who finds himself thrust into war when his peaceful      
         city is invaded  by  an  unknown  enemy.  With  his      
         daughter  missing  and  conventional  weapons   and      
         tactics all but useless, this ordinary cop and  his      
         partner Leo Delgado will rise up to heed  the  call      
         of duty, master the fundamental forces  of  gravity      
         and save the world.                                      
   
         1- Unpack, burn or mount                                 
         2- Install the game                                     
         3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir to                    
            <installdir>bin folder                               
         4- Go To Hell!                                           
                                                                  
       NOTE:                                                      
       There was no valid multilanguage release so far, so        
       here it is. Game is updated to newest version - v5.48.
